channel.title: Weather at Chicago / West Chicago, Dupage Airport, IL - via NOAA's National Weather Service
channel.description: Weather conditions from NOAA's National Weather Service.

item.title: Mostly Cloudy and Breezy and 59 F at Chicago / West Chicago, Dupage Airport, IL
item.description: Winds are from the Southwest at 24.2 gusting to 29.9 MPH (21 gusting to 26 KT). The pressure is 1010.2 mb and the humidity is 56%. The wind chill is 55. Last Updated on Apr 10 2015, 1:52 pm CDT.
